actions.text: Measure reconsidered and indefinitely postponed in Senate, H. Con. Res. 668 passed in lieu.

official_title: Authorizes the Clerk of the House to make corrections in enrollment of H. R. 11510.

summary.text: Authorizes the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 11510, to reorganize and consolidate certain functions of the Federal Government in a new Energy Research and Development Administration and in a new Nuclear Regulatory Commission in order to promote more efficient management of such functions.

titles.title: Authorizes the Clerk of the House to make corrections in enrollment of H. R. 11510.
